#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main()
{
   long int t;
   scanf("%ld",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
       long long int n,m,k,c=0;
       double ss;
       scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &n, &m, &k);
       ss=n;
       while(1)
       {
       if(ss*m<=k)
       {

           ss=ss*m;
           ++c;


       }
        else
        {
           break;
        }

       }

       printf("%lld\n",c);



     }
     return 0;

}
